hangle: 마물을 잡아 흠모하는 상대나 연인에게 사냥감을 바치기!라 대대로 인기가 좋다.
first_translate: you catch a monster and present it to your lover or crush! it’s been popular for generations.
idiom_translate: you had to catch a monster and give it to the person you liked, which is why it was so popular.
label: the competition has always been quite popular for young noblemen as they would catch a beast and offer the game to a lover or someone they admire.
idiom:
땀과 먼지를 뒤집어쓰고 : covered in sweat and dust
말 곱게 써야지 : watch your language
날 왜 이렇게 빤히 보지? : why are you staring at me?
아무 말이나 하게 되네 : I'm just saying whatever comes to mind
